parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.70
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Controls Table

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Selects the line with the given index. Will take only rows, but not headers into account. -1 deselects all. Returns Nothing.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[Control]] '''ctSetCurSel''' [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> index: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_control [[ctSetCurSel]] 0;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ctAddRow]], [[ctAddHeader]], [[ctClear]], [[ctCurSel]], [[ctRowControls]], [[ctHeaderControls]], [[ctRowCount]], [[ctHeaderCount]], [[ctSetValue]], [[ctValue]], [[ctSetData]], [[ctData]], [[ctFindRowHeader]], [[ctFindHeaderRows]], [[ctRemoveRows]], [[ctRemoveHeaders]], [[ctSetRowTemplate]], [[ctSetHeaderTemplate]]
</value></part></template></root>
